Headline: Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute near 50th/East End

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Cornell, 50th, East End, and 51st due to, street blcokage near 50th/East End.
